record.name: Department Transfer
record.description: Request transfer services for an employee. If transfer involves a move, please separately request an Office Relocation service.
record.detailedDescription: Request transfer services for an employee. If transfer involves a move, please separately request an Office Relocation service.
record.options: <form><text id="olddept" label="Old Department"/><text id="newdept" label="New Department"/><text id="date" label="Effective Date"/></form>
